text:
Each packet of this Lipton To Go Stix Iced Green Tea Mix, Tea and Honey, Mango Pineapple is actually good for two servings, according to the printed instructions on the packet. This was just fine with me since I don't like my drink to be too sweet. So I tend to just pour a half-packet's worth of contents into a glass filled with very cold water each time I want to use this product, then give the mix a good stir.

The drink tastes sweet. I can discern the tea but not the mango or pineapple. There is a hint of honey, but the drink's sweetness is probably due to the sucralose, which is listed as the fourth ingredient. I didn't discern an aftertaste. Overall, I think it's a fine drink. Nothing really special to get excited about.
